title: About
text:
Tofu is the nickname of a boy I went to high school with for a few days. I don’t think I ever spoke to him. And I don’t know his real name.
I like talking/writing about religion, movies, and math (among other things).
The painting above is “St. James Led to His Martyrdom” by Andrea Mantegna. It was painted some time in the 1400s.
This blog was made with Quarto by the way. Would recommend. Thanks for visiting my blog.
